nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT latest(rabbitmq.message.current) WHERE state = 'ready' AND instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' OR latest(rabbitmq_queue_messages_ready) WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' AND otel.library.name = 'otelcol/prometheusreceiver' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT latest(rabbitmq.message.current) WHERE state = 'unacknowledged' AND instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' OR latest(rabbitmq_queue_messages_unacked) WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' AND otel.library.name = 'otelcol/prometheusreceiver' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT latest(rabbitmq.message.published) WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' OR sum(rabbitmq_queue_messages_published_total) WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' AND otel.library.name = 'otelcol/prometheusreceiver' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT latest(rabbitmq.message.current) WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' FACET state OR latest(rabbitmq_queue_messages) WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' AND otel.library.name = 'github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/receiver/prometheusreceiver' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT latest(rabbitmq.consumer.count) WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' OR latest(rabbitmq_queue_consumers) WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' AND otel.library.name = 'github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/receiver/prometheusreceiver' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT latest(rabbitmq.consumer.count) AS 'Consumers', sum(rabbitmq.message.current) AS 'Total Messages', latest(rabbitmq_queue_consumers) AS 'Consumers', latest(rabbitmq_queue_messages) AS 'Total Messages' WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry'

FROM Metric SELECT latest(rabbitmq_queue_messages_ram) WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' AND otel.library.name = 'github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/receiver/prometheusreceiver' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT latest(rabbitmq_queue_messages_persistent) WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' AND otel.library.name = 'github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/receiver/prometheusreceiver' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT latest(rabbitmq_queue_process_memory_bytes) WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' AND otel.library.name = 'github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/receiver/prometheusreceiver' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT rate(sum(rabbitmq_queue_disk_reads_total), 1 minute) WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' AND otel.library.name = 'github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/receiver/prometheusreceiver' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT rate(sum(rabbitmq_queue_disk_writes_total), 1 minute) WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' AND otel.library.name = 'github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/receiver/prometheusreceiver' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT latest(rabbitmq_queue_consumer_utilisation) WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' AND otel.library.name = 'github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/receiver/prometheusreceiver' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT latest(rabbitmq_queue_messages) AS 'Total Messages', latest(rabbitmq_queue_messages_ready) AS 'Ready', latest(rabbitmq_queue_messages_unacked) AS 'Unacked', latest(rabbitmq_queue_consumers) AS 'Consumers', latest(rabbitmq_queue_messages_ram) AS 'Messages in RAM', latest(rabbitmq_queue_messages_persistent) AS 'Persistent' WHERE instrumentation.provider = 'opentelemetry' AND otel.library.name = 'github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/receiver/prometheusreceiver' FACET queue, rabbitmq_vhost, rabbitmq_node
